Home |- |November 19 || Hamilton Tigers 21 || Queen's University 6 |} |} *Hamilton advances to the Grey Cup game.https://news.google.com/newspapers?id=e30uAAAAIBAJ&sjid;=AYwFAAAAIBAJ&pg;=6697%2C3330852 The Montreal Gazette - November 21, 1927 ==Grey Cup Championship== {| cellspacing="10" | valign="top" | {| class="wikitable" ! bgcolor="#DDDDDD" colspan="4" |November 26 15th Annual Grey Cup Game: Varsity Stadium - Toronto, Ontario |- || Hamilton Tigers 6 || Toronto Balmy Beach Beachers 9 |- | align="center" colspan="4" | The Toronto Balmy Beach Beachers are the 1927 Grey Cup Champions |- |} |} ==References== Category:Canadian Football League seasons
